name: Chekrut Mutt
text: If you control no monsters: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then you can Special Summon 1 "Chekrut" monster from your Deck, but it cannot be Tributed. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck the turn you activate this effect, except FIRE monsters. When a card or effect is activated that targets a FIRE monster you control while you control a "Chekrut" monster: You can banish this card from your GY; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card. You can only use each effect of "Chekrut Mutt" once per turn.
